text: @realDonaldTrump @GregAbbott_TX Sir, This is insane! I live in Dallas county and Greg Abbott's just bending to your will an other idiots like you to open up TX. The number of for Coronavirus are on a roller coaster ride here and for you to congratulate him on opening up the state make you an idiot too!
